## Description
Refactor PaymentAdapterFactory to support dependency injection and testable factory pattern

## Reason for Delegation
Task requires test isolation and dependency injection across multiple payment processor files (PayPalProcessor, StripeProcessor, PaymentAdapterFactory) involving complex interactions, multiple domains, and testing patterns. Touches 4+ files in backend/src/payment directory and associated test files, exceeding 400 LOC.
